heading: iQOO Neo 6 5G
list: Snapdragon 870 5G Mobile Platform which is a 7nm process technology, It is equipped with A77 architecture adopts a large core clocked at 3.2GHz, a middle core at 2.42GHz, and a small core at 1.8GHz
120Hz E4 AMOLED Display | 1300nits Peak Brightness | 6000000:1 Contrast Ratio | SGS Eye Care Certificate | HDR 10+ | Netflix HDR
64MP OIS Main Camera with GW1P sensor, 8MP Wide Angle Camera & 2MP Macro Camera
